entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
